code: @Test public void testProperty() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedMessageCount(1).     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").to("properties:cool.end").         }     }. }

@Override protected CamelContext createCamelContext() throws Exception {     CamelContext context = super.createCamelContext().     System.setProperty("propFile", "myproperties.properties").     context.addComponent("properties", new PropertiesComponent("classpath:org/apache/camel/component/properties/${propFile}")).     return context. }
@Override @After public void tearDown() throws Exception {     super.tearDown().     System.clearProperty("propFile"). }
